BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Cross
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: This was one of the early hard-baked markings. It’s been pulled into the decal system so it can be recolored and reused across kit.

BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.label: Crimson Guard Medical Corp
BNF.Decals.DecalSymbolDef.description: The Crimson Guard Medical Corp is an emerging institute after the exodus of medical corporations forcing the government to create a means of serving the health of the population.
